entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
